data.description:
Suggestion:-
- Instead of having a sequence name for roles like Role 1 and Role 2, It would be more acceptable if given some meaningful role name.

data.name: New user creation may have confirm password/ re-enter the password for password field
data.description:
Suggestion:-

  • New user creation may have confirm password/ re-enter the password for password field or have an option for password visibility.

Why do we need it:-

  • Sometimes users can mistype the password.
  • Users should have a confirmation of the password they have entered for a better user experience.
  • The show password option can help the user verify if he entered the password correctly.

data.name: Domains issues- see description
data.description:
• Customers are being selected by Email in Domains. Customers with no email are not listed to choose from. (Email is not mandatory while creating a customer.)
  • Related service is not displayed in Domains entries.
  • Previously existing services are not accepted to choose service in Domains.
  • No previous existing data can be edit or update in Domains.
  • Also, newly created domains can not be updated or edited.
  • Can not delete an uploaded file in domains on edit page.
